alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Coastal York; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 23 at 2:10PM EST until December 24 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Storm surge between one and two feet will will combine with the evening high tide to bring water levels close to flood stage. Significant wave action will result in some splashover. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York, Coastal Cumberland, Sagadahoc, Lincoln, Knox and Coastal Waldo Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 23/11 PM 9.3 0.5 1.0 13-15 Minor 24/11 AM 10.2 1.4 0.2 10-12 Minor 25/12 AM 8.5 -0.3 0.1 5 None 25/12 PM 10.0 1.2 -0.1 3-4 None 26/01 AM 8.2 -0.6 -0.3 3 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 23/11 PM 9.7 0.2 1.0 12-13 Minor 24/11 AM 10.7 1.2 0.2 9-11 Minor 25/12 AM 8.9 -0.6 0.1 4-5 None 25/12 PM 10.4 0.9 -0.1 3 None 26/01 AM 8.6 -0.9 -0.3 2 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 23/11 PM 10.8 1.1 1.2 1 Minor 24/11 AM 11.8 2.1 0.3 2-5 Minor 25/12 AM 10.0 0.3 0.3 2 None 25/12 PM 11.4 1.7 -0.1 2 None 26/01 AM 9.5 -0.2 -0.2 2 None Boothbay Harbor ME MLLW Categories - Minor 13.0 ft, Moderate 14.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.3 ft, Moderate 4.3 ft, Major 5.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 23/11 PM 10.7 1.0 1.4 11-12 Minor 24/11 AM 11.6 1.9 0.4 9-10 Minor 25/12 AM 9.8 0.1 0.4 5 None 25/12 PM 11.2 1.5 0.0 4-5 None 26/01 AM 9.4 -0.3 -0.1 3-4 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
